actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

actions.subcommittee: General Farm Commodities and Risk Management
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on General Farm Commodities and Risk Management.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on General Farm Commodities and Risk Management

official_title: To amend the Federal Crop Insurance Act to increase expenditures under pilot programs evaluating the effectiveness of risk management tools for livestock producers, to clarify that the education and information program includes livestock insurance programs and increase funds for the education and information program, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Livestock Farmer Risk Reduction Act - Amends the Federal Crop Insurance Act to: (1) increase expenditure limits under pilot programs evaluating the effectiveness of risk management tools for livestock producers; (2) include livestock insurance within the scope of the partnerships for risk management education program; and (3) increase education and information program funding levels.

titles.title: To amend the Federal Crop Insurance Act to increase expenditures under pilot programs evaluating the effectiveness of risk management tools for livestock producers, to clarify that the education and information program includes livestock insurance programs and increase funds for the education and information program, and for other purposes.
